ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلْطَٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent Musa with Our Signs and clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We sent Moses with Our signs and clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily We sent Moses with Our Signs and a clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent Moses with Our miracles and clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We sent Moosa with Our signs and a clear proof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We sent Musa with Our Ayat, and a manifest authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We sent Musa with Our communications and clear authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We also sent Moses with Our signs and a clear authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily We sent Moses with Our revelations and a clear warrant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent Moses with Our signs and clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We sent Musa with Our signs and a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We sent Moses with Our signs and a manifest authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of old We sent Moses, with Our Signs and an authority manifest,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We sent Musa (Moses) with Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.), and a manifest authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We sent Moses with Our signs and with clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent Moses with Our signs, and a clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:23] And verily We sent Moses with Our signs and a clear warrant, an evident and manifest proof,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily We sent Moses with Our revelations) with Our nine signs (and a clear warrant) a clear proof
